DOC.brief_summary: Over past year , several study make various outcome incidence lymphedema . Because outcome come differently study measurement , criterion , treatment period , treatment method morbid extremities lymphedema . Therefore required understanding incidence , risk factor physical progress treat prevented lymphedema . Also necessary understand characteristic lymphedema measurement establish diagnostic criterion lymphedema comparative study . The aim study analyze incidence risk factor lymphedema prospectively observation , determine effect quality life lymphedema breast cancer surgery ALND .
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Observational Study Lymphedema Breast Cancer With Axillary Lymph Node Dissection
DOC.detailed_description: Primary Objectives : - To analyze incidence rate lymphedema use tape measurement , perometre , bioimpedance , spectroscopy . Secondary Objectives : - To determine risk factor lymphedema postoperative breast cancer . - To understand lymphedema effect quality life physical function postoperative breast cancer . - To complete uestionnaire physical quality life postoperative breast cancer ALND patient .
DOC.criteria: Older 20 year old Patient underwent unilateral Breast Cancer surgery ALND Informed consent must sign Previous history breast cancer History abnormality vascular disease upper extremity Patients serious systemic illness ( renal failure , hepatic dysfunction , congestive heart failure , neurological psychological impairment ) would confound study impair patient ' ability participate . History infection upper extremity History corticosteroid use whole body reason Inability provide inform consent ( e.g . dementia severe cognitive impairment )
DOC.keyword: Breast Cancer , Axillary Lymph Node Dissection , Lymphedema
